fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Customs, Trans-European Networks, Transport
eu_initiatives: DTLF platform, Digital Transports Logistics Forum. Task of the group is to provide advice and technical expertise to the Commission and its services in relation to the preparation of legislative proposals and policy initiatives in the field of digital transport and logistics, as well as in their implementation. This includes in particular coordination and cooperation with Member States and stakeholders.

DTLF Platform
goals__remit:
PortExpertise is an independent business consultancy for maritime and port professionals. 
 
PortExpertise is a team of international maritime and port specialists with focus on financing, legal matters, market research, market audits, insurance claims, ICT, customs, training and market communication. The company is active in research assignments and project management worldwide. Active for international organisations, port authorities and private operators in the maritime sector.
